Christoph Spielmann wrote:
> Hi everybody!
> 
> We are using build heritrix-1.3.0-200412111608 at the
> moment for our project. It works fine with Windows XP
> (with/without Service Pack 1) but NOT with Service
> Pack 2. We tried it with two different computers with
> SP 2 installed and got the same result in both cases.
> Now my question is: Has anybody been able to use a
> version of Heritrix successfully with Windows XP
> Service Pack 2?

Can you be more specific about how it doesn't work?

Does it not launch? Launch but crash? Launch and run
but not make expected progress? Etc.

Do other Java apps work with the same VM?

- Gordon @ IA
